export default function LeaveCheck({ leaves, remainingCL, cancelLeave }) { const monthName = new Date().toLocaleString("en-US", { month: "long" }); return (

Leave Balance – {monthName}

Leave Type Total Applied Remaining
Casual Leave (CL) 1 {leaves.filter(l => l.leaveType === "CL").length} 0 ? "green" : "red" }}> {remainingCL}
Loss of Pay (LOP) — {leaves.filter(l => l.leaveType === "LOP").length} —

Applied Leaves

{leaves.length === 0 ? (

No leaves applied

) : ( {leaves.map((l, i) => ( ))}
Date Leave Type Session Action
{l.date} {l.leaveType} {l.session}
)}
); }
